column2: "Looks like we made it through the first part. I think I'm starting to get the hang of this."
"My heart is still beating like crazy, but I think I should be able to manage."
"You seem to be picking this up much faster than I am."
"I joined the ARKS to search for someone."
"That's why I don't care much about fighting or exam scores."
"Say, partner, why'd you decide to join the ARKS?"
"Wh-what's going on?"
"Emergency notice for all ARKS! Code D has been put into effect on Naberius! Photon levels are critical!"
"I repeat, Code D is in effect on Naberius! Spatial erosion has been observed!"
"P-partner! Look!"
"This can't be happening... These black things are just appearing out of nowhere..."
"I've got a really bad feeling about this. What the hell is going on?"
"Darker appearance confirmed! Activity has exceeded acceptable levels!"
"This is a top priority order for all ARKS! Destroy the Darkers immediately!"
"These... are Darkers? The enemy of the ARKS? It's said they destroy and consume everything in their path."
"What the hell? These things aren't supposed to be on Naberius!"
"We're surrounded! The way we came is blocked, too! What do we do?"
"Break through? Are you crazy, partner? Do you honestly expect to fight through all these Darkers?"
"Well, crap! I guess we really don't have a choice. Let's roll!"
"We might stand a chance if we can find another team..."
"Well, here goes nothing!"
"That... actually went better than expected. They probably won't chase us."
"Where do these things keep coming from?"
"Crap, looks like we've got no choice but to fight!"
